attributes.action: Halifax bank raising variable mortage rates
attributes.additional_details:
FACT - Tax payers own the majority of this bailed out bank. The BOE has not raised interest rates therefore Halifax are clearly profit making out of other people's misery.

If rates are raised from 3.5% to 3.99% the British people have the right to have this matter dedated as this rise will force more vunerable people into poverty.!!! If the gov. see fit they should reverse this decision immediately.
